summary: Implements a complete workflow to train and evaluate a GraphSAGE model on the OGBN‑Products node property prediction dataset using DGL and PyTorch, covering data loading, neighbor sampling, model construction, training loop, and accuracy reporting.
business_intent: Provides a ready‑to‑run example for developers and researchers to benchmark GraphSAGE on a large-scale product graph, illustrating how to apply DGL for graph neural network training and assess model performance.
